refined_question.question_text: What is the primary function of photosynthesis in plant cells?
refined_question.explanation: Photosynthesis is the process by which plants convert light energy into chemical energy (glucose) using chlorophyll.
refined_question.correct_answer: Convert light energy into chemical energy

options.label: A
options.text: Convert light energy into chemical energy
